mapper.select: SELECT note_no as noteNo, user_id as userId, update_at as updateAt, title as title, contents as contents FROM note ORDER BY update_at DESC
SELECT note_no as noteNo, user_id as userId, update_at as updateAt, title as title, contents as contents FROM note WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY update_at DESC
SELECT note_no as noteNo, user_id as userId, update_at as updateAt, title as title, contents as contents FROM note WHERE note_no = #{noteNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (user_id, update_at, title, contents) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET title = ${title}, contents=${contents}, update_at = NOW() WHERE note_no = #{noteNo}
